title: BitcoinGirl.Club
author: BitcoinGirl.Club
content: The whole idea started from a topic created on meta. I feel continuing it on that thread is off topic so here I am moving it. Original idea is below quoted message:Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on October 28, 2022, 11:07:32 AMWhy are some of you too serious about reporting and it's stats? LOLMy reporting accuracy is 89%.Who can tell after all these years how many reports I made?I have some BTC to spare, 0.00098414 BTC.Closest one will receive 0.0003 BTCRest will be sent to two more members.You will post the number of total reports you made so far.The top two will get the reward.Highest number will receive 0.0004 BTC The 2nd highest will receive the rest excluding the fees the transaction need Don't cheat LOLShall we go? Post your btc address with answer. Deadline is 31 October midnight forum time ðŸ˜‚Staff, moderator and admin are excluded ðŸ˜‰Additional information:Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on October 28, 2022, 12:37:37 PMQuote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on October 28, 2022, 11:07:32 AMStaff, moderator and admin are excluded ðŸ˜‰Quote from: ETFbitcoin on October 28, 2022, 11:56:51 AMI expect LoyceV and other user who make statistic thread would be happy to make extrapolated assumption.Additionally LoyceV can not join. Human only. ðŸ¤£I sent a self message with the number of reports I made so far. In case it requires to prove then the PM will be reported to the staff.Join and enjoy the reward. Most importantly have fun! ðŸ¥³

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Submission already posted on the meta board thread are copied in this post.Quote from: ETFbitcoin on October 28, 2022, 11:56:51 AMCode:510bc1q4w024sesxqwusxf3g8nwm3jp29umpcxx2fhwseP.S. I expect it's ranged between 9 to 2541.

comments.author: _morghulis
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on October 28, 2022, 12:42:55 PM<...>Op, I would suggest you lock this thread and create another this time make it self moderated since this reply isn't much, so that you can delete replies that are obviously lies. For example two post above mine one from a newbie account claiming to have reported 377and another from a Jr member with 1234 reports Â .You should be expecting more of this kind of response since the thread is moderated. By the way I have made only one report.~valar~

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Always enjoy a game  Thanks for the opportunity BitcoinGirl.clubÂ My guess for you would be 6722 And my total reports are 4507 reported posts with 100% accuracyGood luck all

Human only. ðŸ¤£Screw you tooðŸ˜˜, I found a loophole!Here's my stats:QuoteYou have reported 48 posts with 91% accuracy (30 good, 3 bad, 15 unhandled). Do not worry about your accuracy too much; one accurate report is worth many inaccurate reports.Since your accuracy is also low, I guess you haven't reported many posts either. My guess: 47 posts.

comments.body: Your name doesn't appear in the old stats on the forum's top reporters, but I think after your account was hacked you became more active with reports. So I guessCode:1750 Reports made by BitcoinGirl.Club I'll submit my BTC address later if I'm right.My own statistic say onlyCode:You have reported 124 posts with 97% accuracy (120 good, 4 bad, 0 unhandled).
